channel.title: Easter event idea
channel.description:
here's my easter event idea but idk how to make it. can sum1 give me a guide on how to make it work?
Easter Event of 2008 by fallen darkness
talk to easter bunny and he says:
easter bunny:Oh know how will Easter go on this year!!!! you: what happened Mr. Easter bunny?!? easter bunny: it's terrible, my twin brother the mischief rabbit has stolen 3 of my easter baksets but I can't walk because i'm too fat to move!!! you: I'll find the 3 baskets for ya just tell me the locations of thethem. easter buny: one is in seers sumwhere, one is in catherby, and the other one is at the Taverly. you: Okay i'll go find them A.S.A.P!!!!! easter bunny: thank you very much!!!\
If you don't have the 3 baksets and you talk to him he will say...
easter bunny: where the hell are my baskets?!? you:ummm i'll go find them!
after you find the baskets you go talk to the easter bunny and he says:
easter bunny: Omg thank you for bringing me my easter baskets!!! you: no problem dude. easter bunny: take this gift it's the least i can do!!
(the fat ass rabbit hands you a pair of bunny ears and when you where them u start to hop up and down)

item.title: Easter event idea
item.dc:creator: @fallen_darkness fallen darkness
item.description:
@fallen_darkness wrote:

here’s my easter event idea but idk how to make it. can sum1 give me a guide on how to make it work?

Easter Event of 2008 by fallen darkness

talk to easter bunny and he says:

easter bunny:Oh know how will Easter go on this year!!!
you: what happened Mr. Easter bunny?!?
easter bunny: it’s terrible, my twin brother the mischief rabbit has stolen 3 of my easter baksets but I can’t walk because i’m too fat to move!!!
you: I’ll find the 3 baskets for ya just tell me the locations of thethem.
easter buny: one is in seers sumwhere, one is in catherby, and the other one is at the Taverly.
you: Okay i’ll go find them A.S.A.P!!!
easter bunny: thank you very much!!!\

If you don’t have the 3 baksets and you talk to him he will say…

easter bunny: where the hell are my baskets?!?
you:ummm i’ll go find them!

after you find the baskets you go talk to the easter bunny and he says:

easter bunny: Omg thank you for bringing me my easter baskets!!!
you: no problem dude.
easter bunny: take this gift it’s the least i can do!!

(the fat ass rabbit hands you a pair of bunny ears and when you where them u start to hop up and down)

Read full topic
